settings.enableToReceive: Enable to receive notifications before prayer times
settings.learnHow: Learn how we handle your data

privacy.introText: Welcome to Noorix's Privacy Policy. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data.
privacy.locationData: Location data (with your permission) to provide accurate prayer times and for analytics to improve calculation methods
privacy.appSettings: App settings such as preferred calculation method, madhab, and time format
privacy.anonymousData: Anonymous usage data through Firebase Analytics and error information through Firebase Crashlytics
privacy.weUse: We use the collected information to:
privacy.providePrayerTimes: Provide accurate prayer times based on your location
privacy.savePreferences: Save your preferences to improve user experience
privacy.improveApp: Improve our app based on anonymous usage data and error reports
privacy.dataStorageText: Your settings and location data are stored locally on your device using localStorage. Some anonymous data is also temporarily stored on Firebase servers for analytics purposes and is only used in aggregated form.
privacy.weUseThirdParty: We use the following third-party services:
privacy.firebaseAnalytics: To collect anonymous data about app usage and improve our services
privacy.aladhanAPI: To fetch accurate prayer times based on your location
privacy.notificationsText: If you enable notifications, we will send local notifications for prayer times. These notifications are processed locally on your device and are not sent through our servers.
privacy.youHaveRights: Since we use anonymized data for analytics stored on Firebase servers, we cannot provide direct access to this data or its deletion on an individual basis. However, you can:
privacy.rightToAccess: Disable data collection using your browser or mobile device settings
privacy.rightToRectify: Clear local app data stored on your device
privacy.rightToErasure: Contact us for more information about how we process your data
privacy.rightToRestrict: Use the app without providing location data (by manually selecting a city)
privacy.changesText: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.
privacy.contactUsText: If you have any questions about our Privacy Policy, please contact us at: byteflipper.business@gmail.com

userGuide.title: Welcome to Noorix
userGuide.welcomeDescription: Noorix helps you track prayer times accurately based on your location. Let's get you started with a quick tour.
userGuide.locationDescription: To provide accurate prayer times, Noorix needs your location. You can either allow automatic detection or select a city from our list.
userGuide.prayerTimesDescription: View accurate prayer times for your location, with countdown to the next prayer and a visual indicator of the current moon phase.
userGuide.notificationsDescription: Never miss a prayer time by enabling notifications. You'll receive alerts before each prayer time.
userGuide.settingsDescription: Adjust calculation methods, time format, language, and other settings to personalize your experience.
